news.content:
Watch the live demo.

ThreeFold Meet ensures end-to-end connection between parties rather than inefficiently going through centralized servers which may be far away and lacking in privacy and security.
news.excerpt: ThreeFold Meet is a P2P alternative to centralized video conferencing solutions.

previous.title: ThreeFold @ Odyssey Momentum 2020!
previous.excerpt: Momentum is an online event of 49 hours with more than 2,000 participants and 105 teams working on 21 complex 21st-century problems.
